ygData.messageBody:
Runes are for wizards.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: daverobinson@... <daverobinson@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 1:00 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] New to this list


>From: daverobinson@...
>
>Hello all
>First I will intrduce myself
>My name is Heden I am a lvl 15 mage from Erudin
>hmmmm well that is about it :)
>
>I have looked at a few of your emails and you
>talk about different langs, first how do you tell
>what lang your book is in.
>
>Also, I have recently been the lucky one to find
>a Rune of Proximity. Why this is lucky, well I don't know
>as I am not sure what class this rune is for.
>
>Thanks for you help, and as I learn i will pass the
>info on to you
>
>Thanks
>David Robinson
>aka Heden
>
